name: fsd-cruise
description: Simple cli tool to visualize your FSD architecture (based on dependency-cruiser)

scripts.depcruise:archi1: cd /Users/antonm/_dev/typing/typing-trainer && depcruise --version && depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.cjs --output-type archi ./src | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > ./fsd-high-level-dependencies.html
scripts.depcruise:archi: depcruise --version && depcruise --config depcruise-config.cjs --output-type archi src | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > high-level-dependencies.html

author: Anton Mendelson
